snippet: Seven of nine states expected to be close in the presidential election have laws or constitutional provisions that prohibit same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: Seven of nine states expected to be close in the presidential election have laws or constitutional provisions that prohibit same-sex marriage.

headline.seo: Same-Sex Marriage Not Supported in Swing States
headline.main: Same-Sex Marriage Not Supported in Most Swing States

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
